content: Transformations are a subset of spells you have access to in Black Myth: Wukong. These spells allow you to turn into enemies and bosses you have faced for an extended period of time. In their form, you can perform several moves, including light attacks, heavy attacks using Focus, and occasionally a special attack like a self-destruct.

This is an excerpt from the file 'Transformation_Spells.md', within the main section titled 'Transformation Spells'.
The content is as follows:
Transformations are a subset of spells you have access to in Black Myth: Wukong. These spells allow you to turn into enemies and bosses you have faced for an extended period of time. In their form, you can perform several moves, including light attacks, heavy attacks using Focus, and occasionally a special attack like a self-destruct.
